reviews.review_msg: I think Professor Bossavit is amazing! Though she may be a little tough with marking at times, her feedback is very helpful and she seems to really care about her students. She is always more than happy to help you if you are confused about a topic. I enjoyed her lectures and she was very forgiving with the grammar tests allowing us 5 chances.
She's a great prof who really wants her students to learn French and helps in any way possible to make sure they succeed.

Came from highschool, was in for a shock when I realized her class was ENTIRELY in French! Super nice, very patient - sometimes she has to repeat things multiple times or in different ways for me to understand. Our class is pretty informal - she lets us have fun and be creative. Quizzes - straightforward and boost mark. Exams are manageable.
